basics.name: Tevin Sales
basics.label: Development Specialist at Hawaiian Electric Company
basics.summary: Hello! I am Tevin Sales and I grew up on the island of Oahu in Hawaii. I have graduated from the University of Hawaii at Manoa with a Bachelor's degree in Information and Computer Science. Throughout my career I've made various web applications and automation scripts using many different languages including Java, C#, ASP.NET, Python and much more. My main interests in programming involve sofware development and game development. When I'm not coding, I enjoy watching soccer or playing video games. If you have any questions feel free to message me at anytime!

work.summary: Develops and supports Hawaiian Electric's tech frameworks for various projects involving geographical databases and web applications.
highlights: Developed automation scripts for geodatabase processes and web applications using Python and PowerShell.
Designing and coding of CRUD web applications using ASP.NET, C#, SQL, Visual Studio.
Performed functional, non-functional, regression and performance tests for updated systems.
Modified existing software systems to enhance performance and add new features.
Conducted lifecycle software development in multiple software environments.

work.summary: Provides technical assistance and advisory for clients within Microsoft Azure's cloud infrastructure.
highlights: Work with product team to provide information when bugs with products are found.
Helped solved network connectivity issues between local networks and Azure networks for application connectivity.
Worked with many Microsofts cloud products such as Application Gateways, VPN Gateways, Traffic Managers, Load Balancers, Azure Firewall
Networking Fundamentals (HTTP, TCP, IPSec, DNS, BGP, etc.)

work.summary: Assists UH Manoa lab occupants with ITS related jobs.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee ITS Lab computer stations.
Assist any users with hardware or software.
Create and update support tickets online.

work.summary: Chef for fast food side of Zippy's Restuarants in Hawaii.
highlights: Able to work under high pressure situations during a rush hour.
Work together as a team with other staff members to provide service.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Fall 2015, Fall 2016, Earned a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher.
